name: Gear Third Chibi Form
description: A negative side-effect of Gear Third where Luffy shrinks to a miniature chibi-sized version of himself after the technique ends. The duration of the shrunken state is roughly equivalent to the time spent in Gear Third mode.

keyMoments.description: Luffy experiences the chibi shrinking effect after Gear Third expires, becoming vulnerable and losing his stretching ability and strength
keyMoments.significance: First full display of Gear Third's major weakness, showing the strategic trade-off of using the powerful technique

weaknesses: Little to no ability to stretch
Punches have no effect on opponents
Duration tied to time spent in Gear Third
Forces user to run and hide until normal size returns
